o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_SourceObjectEdit
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj) ' Show the object picker and fetch the selected source object. Dim selObj : Set selObj = SelectSourceObject(obj.Parent)
' If a source object was selection update the joiner. If Not(selObj Is Nothing) Then obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_SourceObject", selObj End If End Sub
